scene.title: Sword Dance under The Moon
scene.text: It was deep into the night, yet 「Eagle」 wasn’t tired.
The parlor of the dilapidated Stop was brightly lit, making the light and shadows divide the yard outside of the hall into two.
「Eagle」stood in the yard. His eight most trusted subordinates stood nearby, watching him sword dancing.
「Eagle」 was no swordsman, nor was he proficient in swordsmanship. He was once a member of the military, and learned greatsword techniques.

text.p: Sword and greatsword techniques appeared the same, but they were, in fact completely different.
As people say [Swords are quick, greatswords are strong.] Swords travelled with trickery, flexible yet varying; greatswords were fair, breaking through with power.
When a sword wielder was given a greatsword, they would use it like a sword, and the same applied vice versa.
Therefore, although 「Eagle」 looked like he was sword dancing, he was actually greatsword dancing.

motion.img: 老鹰-狞笑-拔刀预备-近景

scene.text: The reason why he had the sword, was because the sword is really satisfying.

text.p: He had never seen such a perfect blade!

scene.text: 「Eagle」 hauled the sword in his hand, his movement swift. Suddenly his wrist quivered, and three sword flowers bloomed.
It seemed to be like an ink filled brush. Wherever the sword went, dark gray lines were left behind in the air, like freehand calligraphy.

text.p: This was exactly like the beauty of the sword’s patterns, very gratifying.

scene.text: 「Eagle」 stabbed sharply with the sword, and exerted strength from his wrist. The sword’s body didn’t move, yet the sword edge seemed to quiver slightly, singing with the sound of a soft hum.

text.p: This fit the firmness of the sword’s body, sturdiness and softness.

scene.text: The sword slowed down so much that it appeared to have stopped. The blade was placed next to his chest, emitting an overwhelmingly cold and sharp light.

text.p: This showed the strength of the sword’s light. The light was so cold that it penetrated through bones.

motion.img: 老鹰-狞笑-拔刀预备-近景

scene.text: 「Eagle」 couldn’t help but laugh heartily, and he pulled out a string of hair and held it above the blade. When he let it go, the hair split to two.
This was just how sharp the sword was: so sharp that it would cut falling hair.
If it had the four aforementioned traits, this sword could be considered as legendary.

motion.img: 老鹰-专注-拔刀预备-近景

scene.text: 「Eagle」 murmured.

text.p: 「Eagle」 wasn’t a sword lover or collector.
Even if he spoke words of praise, it was nothing more than a bandit admiring his spoils.

scene.text: A person who knew goods well would be able to tell that this sword on the girl’s body was worth more than silver or gold.
But he was still a warrior.
Famous swords were like beautiful jades since ancient times, and whoever won them would be admired.
「Eagle」 decided to keep it. Not because it had anything to do with gold or silver, but rather as a symbol of status.
After all, a figure like him, should have a weapon that matches.
The more he examined Li Sushang’s『Xuanyuan Sword』from left to right, the more gratified he became.
scene.dialog: [Do you like my sword that much?]

cg.img: CG_第一折_鹰李对峙_鹰惊李抱胸
CG_第一折_鹰李对峙_鹰惊李抱胸

scene.text: 「Eagle」 was shocked, and instinctively backed away six feet.

text.p: He couldn’t believe the scene in front of his eyes.[\s]
Eight men were lying on the ground, all unconscious.
And the girl that he ordered to be taken to the Dark Dungeon, was blinking at him.[\s]
[em italic]WHAT HAPPENED!?!?[/em]

scene.text: …If this was a joke, he would cut the mastermind into pieces, and feed them to a horse.

cg.img: CG_第一折_鹰李对峙_鹰惊李伸手

scene.text: But the girl appeared fearless, stretching her hands:
scene.dialog: [Hey, you’ve played enough with it, so it’s time to give it back to me now.]
scene.text: 「Eagle」 was already distraught, but the girl’s dialogue made him even more irritated.
He didn’t like the feeling of being confused about the circumstances, and he wanted to regain control of the situation.
scene.dialog: [Oh, it was the Raksha who helped me out… Eh, where did he go?]

cg.img: CG_第一折_鹰李对峙_鹰惊李普通_呆滞

scene.text: The girl turned her head, her back, and looked around.

cg.img: CG_第一折_鹰李对峙_鹰惊李普通_呆滞

text.p: 「Eagle」 cursed at himself viciously in his mind.[\s]
If you were aware of a『hazard』, then it would be better to get rid of it as soon as possible.
It was precisely because hazards were feared, that hazards often caused problems.[\s]
「Eagle」 regretted not paying attention to the strange Raksha, but at this moment, regret was no longer helpful.
He stepped back quietly, forming a safe distance for dialogue. This was actually unnecessary, because he was the one holding the sword.[\s]
…But, it wasn’t the girl Eagle was worried about.

scene.text: At this moment, the moon shone brightly. The shadows reflected by the throbbing candlelight danced wildly on the bluestone floor, and it was a good time to solve the problem.

cg.img: CG_第一折_鹰李对峙_鹰惊李伸手

scene.text: The girl was telling the truth, she seemed to not know what lies were.
scene.dialog: [He was behind me, but he suddenly disappeared.]
scene.text: This truly was the worst answer.[\s]In fact, 「Eagle」 didn’t pay attention to the girl at all. [\s]No matter how good an opponent’s martial arts was, it was impossible for him to lose to such a straightforward kid.

text.p: From the beginning to the end, he regarded that Raksha as his biggest threat.
And being unable to grasp that person’s movements made him anxious.

scene.text: The Raksha may have disappeared faraway, or may be hiding somewhere just waiting for an opportunity— but no matter what it was, a thorn was always in his heart. He wouldn’t feel at ease until he took him out.
scene.dialog: [Hey, don’t look for him, your opponent right now is me.]

cg.img: CG_第一折_鹰李对峙_鹰惊李抱拳_哼

scene.text: The girl retracted her outstretched hand, her palm was over her fist.
scene.dialog: [I’m gonna take my sword back now~ Eldest Disciple of Wanderer’s House Li Sushang, please enlighten me!]
scene.text: Though the words were inappropriate for the present moment, she spoke anyway, making a strange pose.
Before 「Eagle」 could react, the girl suddenly appeared in front of him.
Quicker than words could tell, he felt pain in his forearm, and the sword dropped from his hand.
He took another palm to the chest.
「Eagle」 staggered back a few steps, hurriedly adjusting his breath, but his inner organs were in turmoil, and it was difficult to calm down.

motion.img: 老鹰-惊讶-肉搏备战-中景

text.p: Since this palm wasn’t powered by internal force, though it was heavy, since it didn’t hurt the internal organs after all.
But the girl’s agility was something 「Eagle」 rarely saw.
Shocked, 「Eagle」 left the Raksha behind in his mind,
and decided to re-evaluate this opponent who was between ten to twenty years old.
